/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -std=c++0x -g -O0 -ggdb  -fPIC CMakeFiles/kafka-log-sender.dir/kafka-log-sender.cc.o CMakeFiles/kafka-log-sender.dir/ClientProxy.cc.o CMakeFiles/kafka-log-sender.dir/Constants.cc.o CMakeFiles/kafka-log-sender.dir/Serializer.cc.o  -o kafka-log-sender -rdynamic -lavrocpp /usr/local/lib/libkafka.so -lboost_filesystem-mt -lboost_system-mt -lboost_program_options-mt /usr/local/lib/libsnappy.so -lz -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
